select PHOTO_ID as "id", TAKEN_DATE as "date", LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, USER_ID as "personId", SMALLURL, TITLE, VIEWED from FLICKR_WORLD p where p.REGION_${radius}_ID = #{areaid} and p.TAKEN_DATE >= to_timestamp(#{queryStr}, #{dbDatePatternStr}) and p.TAKEN_DATE < to_timestamp(#{queryStr}, #{dbDatePatternStr}) + interval '1' ${queryLevel} order by p.TAKEN_DATE desc limit #{num}

select p.PHOTO_ID as "id", p.TAKEN_DATE as "date", p.LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE, p.USER_ID as "personId", p.SMALLURL, p.TITLE, p.VIEWED from flickr_world_split_tag t, flickr_world p where t.REGION_${radius}_ID = #{areaid} and t.tag = #{tag} and t.TAKEN_DATE >= to_timestamp(#{queryStr}, #{dbDatePatternStr}) and t.TAKEN_DATE < to_timestamp(#{queryStr}, #{dbDatePatternStr}) + interval '1' ${queryLevel} and t.photo_id = p.photo_id order by t.TAKEN_DATE desc limit #{num} offset #{offset}
